title: Collaborative delivery and personal services
description: EcoDeli is a crowdshipping platform that connects individuals and businesses for package delivery and personal services.

features.title: Our Services
features.description: EcoDeli offers a wide range of services to meet all your needs.

delivery.title: Package Delivery
delivery.description: Have your packages delivered by individuals at a lower cost and in an eco-friendly way.

services.title: Personal Services
services.description: Benefit from personalized services such as transportation, pet sitting, or small tasks.

merchants.title: Merchant Space
merchants.description: Offer home delivery to your customers through our network of deliverers.
